channel.title: Rob Key – deadbadger.net
channel.description: in a state of advanced decomposition

item.title: Selection Policy – a Plea
item.dc:creator: Dead Badger
item.description: I held this back because King Cricket gets first dibs on Rob Key-related things. Unfortunately Rob bided his time on an England recall for a bit longer than any of us mortals might’ve hoped, but The Day is finally here. Sort of. He played! Sent to England cricket coach Peter Moores on May 1, 2008. Continue reading →
